metadata.title: CVE-2019-7251 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An Integer Signedness issue (for a return code) in the res_pjsip_sdp_rtp module in Digium Asterisk versions 15.7.1 and earlier and 16.1.1 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to crash Asterisk via a specially crafted SDP protocol violation.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:16.2.1~dfsg-2build2').
